text: Micky van de Ven (born 19 April 2001) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays as a defender for Volendam. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Volendam II |2019–20 |Tweede Divisie |6||1||colspan="2"|–||0||0||6||1 |- |Volendam |2019–20 |Eerste Divisie |19||0||1Appearances in the KNVB Cup||0||0||0||20||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !25!!1!!1!!0!!0!!0!!26!!1 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Volendam players Category:Eerste Divisie players
